summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding a trial subpoena for a witness where no records are requested, seeking confirmation on the document's format. It indicates ongoing trial preparation in a case, likely related to the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, is seeking confirmation about the format of a trial subpoena for a witness where no records are being requested.

events.title: Trial Subpoena Inquiry
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email seeking confirmation on the format of a trial subpoena for a witness where no records are requested.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 28, 2021, concerning a trial subpoena.
The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The subpoena is for a witness and does not request any records, indicating a focus on testimony.
The email seeks confirmation on the format of such a subpoena, suggesting procedural preparation for trial.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Southern District of New York related to a case, likely connected to the Epstein investigation.
